ygData.subject: Re: 7th Level Qeynos Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: Just two add my two cents. BB is a great place so dont fill intimidated, just know your escape routes. Remember monks get the safe fall skill (at 8 i think)
ygData.messageBody:
Just two add my two cents. BB is a great place so dont fill intimidated,
just know your escape routes. Remember monks get the safe fall skill (at 8 i
think) and BB is filled with little bridges, if you tet in trouble dont take
the path, just fall off a bridge and run out, they will be on your behind
but too far away too catch you. Ths also really helps to build you safe
fall! I worked BB from 7-12 before heading to gukk where I have been living
since with some adventuring up to crush and infected for some change of
vista!
